channel.title: Pits help
channel.description:
i got 2 problem about my fighting pit...i made it were u dont loose stuff *but*! when you are poisoned and u die out of poison u loose stuff!! and the other problem is when you die you got to logg out and in in order to move please help me with my of these two problem if you can or atleast post something
thanks, xx robie xx
